member.name: T:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Attributes.DurableActivityTriggerAttribute
member.summary: Azure-compatible durable activity trigger attribute for compatibility with Azure Durable Functions. Maps to the underlying Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Attributes.FunctionTriggerAttribute.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Attributes.FunctionNameAttribute
member.summary: Azure-compatible function name attribute for compatibility with Azure Durable Functions. Maps to the underlying Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Attributes.FunctionNameAttribute.

member.summary: Gets the name of the function.

member.name: T:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.AsynkronDurableFunctionsExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to help bridge Azure Durable Functions APIs with Asynkron.DurableFunctions.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.AsynkronDurableFunctionsExtensions.ToAzureContext(Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Core.IOrchestrationContext)
member.summary: Creates an Azure-compatible orchestration context adapter.
member.param: The Asynkron orchestration context.
member.returns: An Azure-compatible orchestration context.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.AsynkronDurableFunctionsExtensions.ToAzureActivityContext(Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Core.IFunctionContext,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an Azure-compatible activity context adapter.
member.param: The Asynkron function context.
The input to the activity function.
member.returns: An Azure-compatible activity context.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.AsynkronDurableFunctionsExtensions.RegisterAzureOrchestrator(Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Core.DurableFunctionRuntime,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object)
member.summary: Registers an Azure-style orchestrator function with the Asynkron runtime. This method handles the conversion between Azure attributes and Asynkron registration.
member.param: The Asynkron durable function runtime.
The method representing the orchestrator function.
The instance containing the method (null for static methods).

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.AsynkronDurableFunctionsExtensions.RegisterAzureActivity(Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Core.DurableFunctionRuntime,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object)
member.summary: Registers an Azure-style activity function with the Asynkron runtime. This method handles the conversion between Azure attributes and Asynkron registration.
member.param: The Asynkron durable function runtime.
The method representing the activity function.
The instance containing the method (null for static methods).

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.AsynkronDurableFunctionsExtensions.RegisterAzureFunctionsFromType(Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Core.DurableFunctionRuntime,System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Automatically registers all Azure-style functions (orchestrators and activities) from a given type.
member.param: The Asynkron durable function runtime.
The type containing the functions to register.
The instance of the type (null for static methods).

member.name: T:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.DurableActivityContextAdapter
member.summary: Adapter that bridges Azure's IDurableActivityContext to Asynkron's IFunctionContext. This allows Azure Durable Functions code to work with the Asynkron implementation.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The underlying Asynkron function context.
The input to the activity function.

member.summary: Adapter that bridges Azure's IDurableOrchestrationClient to Asynkron's IOrchestrationClient. This allows Azure Durable Functions code to work with the Asynkron implementation.

member.name: T:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableActivityContext
member.summary: Azure-compatible durable activity context interface for compatibility with Azure Durable Functions. Maps to the underlying Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Core.FunctionContext.

member.name: P:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableActivityContext.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets the instance ID of the orchestration that called this activity.

member.summary: Gets the input to the activity, deserialized to the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type to deserialize the input to.
member.returns: The deserialized input object.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableActivityContext.GetInput
member.summary: Gets the input to the activity as a string.
member.returns: The input string.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableActivityContext.CreateReplaySafeLogger(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a replay-safe logger for the activity context.
member.param: The category name for the logger.
member.returns: A logger instance.

member.name: T:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationClient
member.summary: Azure-compatible durable orchestration client interface for compatibility with Azure Durable Functions. Maps to the underlying Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Core.IOrchestrationClient.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationClient.StartNewAsync(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Starts a new orchestration instance with the specified function name and input.
member.param: The name of the orchestrator function to start.
The JSON serializable input to pass to the orchestrator function.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the instance ID of the started orchestration.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationClient.StartNewAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Starts a new orchestration instance with the specified function name, input, and instance ID.
member.param: The name of the orchestrator function to start.
A unique ID to use for the new orchestration instance.
The JSON serializable input to pass to the orchestrator function.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the instance ID of the started orchestration.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationClient.GetStatusAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the status of the specified orchestration instance.
member.param: The ID of the orchestration instance to query.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the status of the specified orchestration instance.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationClient.GetStatusAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the status of the specified orchestration instance.
member.param: The ID of the orchestration instance to query.
Boolean marker for including execution history in the response.
Boolean marker for including input and output in the execution history response.
Boolean marker for including the input in the response.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the status of the specified orchestration instance.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationClient.RaiseEventAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sends an event notification message to a waiting orchestration instance.
member.param: The ID of the orchestration instance that will handle the event.
The name of the event.
The JSON serializable data associated with the event.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationClient.TerminateAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Forcefully terminates an orchestration instance.
member.param: The ID of the orchestration instance to terminate.
The reason for terminating the orchestration instance.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationClient.PurgeInstanceHistoryAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Purges orchestration instance state and history for orchestrations older than the specified threshold time.
member.param: The ID of the orchestration instance to purge.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains information about the number of purged instances.

member.summary: Azure-compatible purge history result.

member.name: T:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext
member.summary: Azure-compatible durable orchestration context interface for compatibility with Azure Durable Functions. Maps to the underlying Asynkron.DurableFunctions.Core.IOrchestrationContext.

member.name: P:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext.FunctionName
member.summary: Gets the name of the function associated with the current orchestration context.

member.name: P:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext.ParentInstanceId
member.summary: Gets the instance ID of the parent orchestration, if this orchestration was started by another orchestration.

member.name: P:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets the instance ID of the orchestration.

member.name: P:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext.CurrentUtcDateTime
member.summary: Gets the current date and time in UTC.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext.CallActivityAsync``1(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Calls an activity function asynchronously.
member.typeparam: The return type of the activity function.
member.param: The name of the activity function to call.
The JSON serializable input to pass to the activity function.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the output of the activity function.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext.CallActivityAsync(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Calls an activity function asynchronously without expecting a return value.
member.param: The name of the activity function to call.
The input to pass to the activity function.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext.CreateTimer(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Creates a timer that expires at the specified time.
member.param: The time when the timer should fire.
member.returns: A task that completes when the timer expires.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext.WaitForExternalEvent``1(System.String)
member.summary: Waits for an external event to be raised.
member.typeparam: The type of the event data.
member.param: The name of the event to wait for.
member.returns: A task that completes when the event is raised. The task result contains the event data.

member.summary: Gets the input to the orchestration, deserialized to the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type to deserialize the input to.
member.returns: The deserialized input object.

member.summary: Gets a logger for the orchestration context.

member.name: M:Asynkron.DurableFunctions.AzureAdapter.Core.IDurableOrchestrationContext.CallSubOrchestratorAsync(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Calls a sub-orchestrator function asynchronously without expecting a return value.
member.param: The name of the sub-orchestrator function to call.
